hero.title: Safe and Reliable
hero.subtitle: Professional medical appointment system for international patients. Book your appointments conveniently without language barriers. Available nationwide across Korea.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Communicate comfortably in Korean, English, and Vietnamese

ai.title: AI + Professional Staff
ai.description: AI assistant collects information while professional consultants handle accurate booking processing

secure.title: Secure Information Protection
secure.description: Your personal and medical information is safely protected

translation.title: Korean Memo Service
translation.description: Our professional staff will create accurate Korean memo based on your symptoms to show to doctors

nationwide.title: Nationwide Service
nationwide.description: Hospital booking available anywhere in Korea

quality.title: Carefully Selected Hospitals
quality.description: We selectively recommend only trusted hospitals with excellent reviews from Vietnamese and English-speaking patients

process.title: Booking Process
process.subtitle: Complete your booking in 4 simple steps

chat.welcome: Hello! I'm Mimi ğŸŒ¸ I'll help you book a medical appointment. Don't worry about language barriers - our professional staff will handle your appointment booking and create a Korean memo for you to show to the doctor!
chat.askSymptoms: Please describe your symptoms in detail.
chat.askDepartment: Which medical department would you like to visit? If you're not sure, please select 'Not Sure'!
chat.askLocation: Which area would you prefer for the hospital? (Please be specific)
chat.askDate: When would you like to have your appointment? Please select a date from the calendar.
chat.askLanguage: Please select the language for your consultation.
chat.complete:
Your appointment request has been completed! ğŸ‰

Our real professional consultants will contact you directly soon to handle accurate appointment processing and create a perfect Korean memo based on your symptoms to show to the doctor!

Service available nationwide across Korea. Thank you!

auth.magicLinkDescription: Enter your email address and we'll generate a management token
auth.tokenInputDescription: Please enter the management token you received
auth.tokenNote: In actual service, this would be sent via email

bookings.title: My Bookings
bookings.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
bookings.requestSubmitted: Request submitted. Our team will contact you soon.
